description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) For Task-Based Informatics Professional Service: Requirements for services (TBIPS) GSIN: D302A – Informatics Professional services
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
### **Request for Proposal for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services**

#### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01014493
* **Solicitation Number**: 9F032-21-0447-B
* **Date of Publication**: 2022-11-23
* **Closing Date and Time**: 2022-11-28 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (excl. NCR)

#### Tender Scope
The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is seeking proposals for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services under the Commercial (TBIPS) contract, with a focus on requirements for services (G301A). This procurement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information
* **Contact Person**: Julie Mercier
* **Email**: julie.mercier@asc-csa.gc.ca
* **Estimated Level of Effort**: To be indicated in the Statement of Work (SOW)
* **Contract Duration**: From one year after the contract award date

The tender will be closed on 2022-11-28 2:00 PM (EST).

Relevant Details:
* Estimated Level of Effort should be indicated in the Statement of Work (SOW)
* Contract duration is from one year after the contract award date
* The procurement method is competitive open bidding under the TBIPS contract 

Final Recommendations:
We believe that there is sufficient information provided. However, we recommend verifying the correctness of the closing date and time, as well as ensuring clarity on the estimated level of effort and contract duration. Focus should be placed on presenting a well-structured and concise tender proposal that aligns with the tender requirements. Quality of the proposal will play a decisive role in the procurement outcome.

Verify the contract locaton and have any taxines clarified,
